name: Ultimate Browser Specific Css
author: sureshdsk

sections.description:
This script helps to write css for the following

Browsers:

Internet Explorer 6
Internet Explorer 7
Internet Explorer 8
Internet Explorer 9
Internet Explorer 10
Mozilla Firefox
Safari
Google Chrome
Opera
Konqueror
Maxthon
Rockmelt
Flock

Mobile Browsers:

Internet Explorer Mobile
Opera Mini
Opera Mobile
Firefox Mobile
Bolt

Operating systems:

Windows (All windows os)

Windows XP
Windows Vista
Windows 7
Windows 8
Mac
iOS(iphone,ipad and ipod)
Linux

Devices:

iPhone
iPad
iPod
Android
Symbian
Blackberry
Windows phone

More information:

read documentation

sections.installation:
1. Upload browser-specific-css folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where to write custom css ?
Dashboard -> Browser specific css
Write your own css and save
for instructions on how to write browser specific css
read documentation
